name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Cyber Ghost Festival

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 19, several media outlets and bloggers published articles titled "U.S. Embassy in China Fake News Rebutted by Global Times", claiming that the U.S. Embassy deliberately changed the letter l on the webpage to the number 1, creating the illusion that the news was inaccessible, but was refuted by Global Times.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
A mother in Zibo, Shandong, posted on Weibo that her daughter, who was in the third grade of Boshan No. 6 Middle School, had a hearing disability, but was suspected of being targeted by her class teacher and eventually jumped from the class teacher's office and died.
After the child jumped from the building, the local education bureau was reluctant to deal with the matter and shirked responsibility many times. It refused to supervise the matter on the grounds that "the province knew about this matter, and supervision now would affect the school's credibility", and kept delaying the establishment of an investigation team.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On August 18, "Li Peixia was criticized for being full of five evils" became a hot search
Such a high-level verdict aroused doubts and confusion among the public, and many netizens believed that Li Peixia's crime was not so serious.
Some netizens also said, "The township secretary in a small county with an underdeveloped economy is full of five evils, so aren't people in other places even more evil?"
Currently, this topic has been banned and is not displayed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 19, in Dalian, Liaoning, after heavy rain, some parts of the city were severely flooded. A father and daughter were washed under a bus by the accumulated water, and the local authorities officially declared them dead.

name: 李老师不是你老师

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to Japanese media reports, in the early morning of August 19, the stone pillars at the entrance of the Yasukuni Shrine in Chiyoda District, Tokyo were graffitied again. The words on the stone pillars were written in Chinese characters, including "toilet, garbage, militarism, die" and so on.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Chinese netizens denied that it was written by Chinese people.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 22 is the 120th birthday of Deng Xiaoping. Cover of the 16th issue of People's Daily's Global People magazine.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: This morning, General Secretary of the Communist Party of China Central Committee and President Xi Jinping held talks with General Secretary of the Communist Party of Vietnam Central Committee and President To Lin, who was on a state visit to China, at the Great Hall of the People in Beijing.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 18, Chinese state media reported that "159 countries will adopt the new BRICS payment system", but some people found that this was an old news from half a year ago. According to the Russian Satellite Communications Agency: The Governor of the Russian Central Bank mentioned "159 participants from 20 countries" but now it has become "159 countries"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 19, after many places adjusted the COVID-19 vaccine fee to self-paid vaccination, many places have announced the COVID-19 vaccine prices one after another recently, with the lowest price of 0.2 ml/dose being 126 yuan/dose. In response, netizens said, "It's useless to get the vaccine" and "I won't even get the free one."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the morning of August 19, General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and President Xi Jinping held talks with General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Vietnam and President To Lin, who was on a state visit to China, at the Great Hall of the People in Beijing.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 19, it was reported that the former Party branch secretary of Kongxingtai Community in Shoushan Town, Liaoyang County, took advantage of his position to misappropriate 87.3 million yuan of collective funds and embezzled 82.8 million yuan of collective funds. Liaoyang County, with a population of 370,000, had a fiscal revenue of less than 1 billion yuan last year.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On August 13, Shandong Moyi Labor Service Co., Ltd. won the bid for the "12345" platform service outsourcing project of Liaocheng City's 12345 Citizen Hotline Acceptance Center, with an amount of 16,665,264 yuan.
Netizens responded, "I didn't expect that this last channel to solve the suffering of the people could also be outsourced."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A photo and screenshot circulating online showed that the graffiti artist took a selfie after completing the graffiti at the Yasukuni Shrine, and said that he returned to China from Haneda Airport on the morning of the 19th.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 15, CCTV reported: The United States has never surpassed any African country in infrastructure. In 2018, the Morocco high-speed rail was successfully opened to traffic, while the United States has not even laid a few tracks. As a superpower, it always talks about competing with China in infrastructure, but in the end it has not even surpassed any African country.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Michelin also started selling "poor man's set meal" Recently, it was reported online that L'Atelier 18, a high-end restaurant in Shanghai with an average price of 1,580 yuan per person, had closed down. Along with the closure, there was also news that the employees' salaries were in arrears. More and more high-end restaurants have begun to cut prices to cope with weak consumption. For example, Xin Rongji launched a "poor man's set meal" of 398 yuan. Lamelouse not only downgraded its set meal but also gave away 200 yuan of coffee and sparkling water. EHB, with an average price of 4,400 yuan, cut the price of its classic set meal by one-third.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Milk tea is back below 10 yuan. Mixue Ice City, which focuses on cost-effectiveness, has already attracted many consumers with 4 yuan lemonade, 2 yuan ice cream, 1 yuan ice cup, etc. Shuyi Shaoxiancao has launched new products, most of which are priced below 10 yuan. In some areas, Guming lemonade has dropped from 10 yuan to 4 yuan. Chabaidao's yogurt purple rice dew is only 2.9 yuan per cup after discount. Heytea has also launched a limited-time event, "Pure Green Tea Queen" 4 yuan per cup.

content:
The art teacher of Dalian No. 33 Middle School reported in real name
The director, deputy director, personnel section chief, and principal of Dalian Zhongshan District Education Bureau abused their power, concealed and tampered with their own files, illegally transferred and resold teacher positions, and embezzled national finances.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 7, a judge in Luohe, Henan was murdered. On August 18, a netizen posted a message asking the murdered judge Wang Jiajia, "Why did you wrongly accuse my son of drunk driving?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 18, Handan, Hebei. A man posted a video saying that he was applying for a new bank card at Yongnian Postal Bank, and the staff asked him to prove that he didn't have the card. But the man said, "I came here to apply for a new card, and now I am asked to provide proof that my card is lost. How can I prove it?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Recently, many middle schools across the country ended their summer vacation early and asked students to return to school
The senior year of Xi'an Middle School in Shaanxi Province was originally scheduled to start on August 26, but the students were asked to return to school early on August 19, while the school was under renovation and there were no conditions for classes.
However, because parents jointly appealed to the school, the students complained to the education department to no avail and were forced to start school early.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: It is said that Yang Qi, the co-producer of the online game "Black Myth: Wukong", posted a picture on Weibo on July 18, 2013 showing a man giving the middle finger to Chairman Mao's photo at Tiananmen Square, and was reported to the police by netizens.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
According to Business Insider on August 14: Now 98% of Chinese banks (even small local banks) refuse to accept payments from Russia.
However, according to previous news, China's payment business to Russia is currently mainly handled by Hunchun Bank, Jilin Bank, Changchun Rural Commercial Bank, Changchun Development Bank, and Yanbian Rural Commercial Bank.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 15, Shanghai. Netizens posted a post complaining about the cover of the new sixth-grade English textbook: "It really has returned to the aesthetic level of the 1950s. If you hadn't told me, I would have thought it was a North Korean textbook."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A 33-year-old Ningxia woman died in a rental house. Xianyang police: This is true. The incident happened in Qindu District. The case is currently being handled.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 19 (Release) Shangrao, Jiangxi. A man reported the president of Guangfeng Court, Luo Jie, under his real name, saying that he was morally corrupt and had long been corrupt and perverted the law. "Luo Jie likes to play with women, and he is well-known in the political and business circles of Guangfeng."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 18, Shenyang, Liaoning. The second phase of Huizhishanhu was unfinished, and the owners were forced to live in an unfinished building and were evicted by security guards. The owner said, "I can't live anymore. I have been in the military for five years. I sold my house and paid for my retirement expenses. I am happily waiting to buy a house, but until now, my wife and son still live with someone else." At home, you fight with me every day to get divorced.”

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 19, affected by the beautiful typhoon wind, after nearly 20 days of search and rescue, 50 people were confirmed dead and 15 missing in Zixing, Hunan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 18, in Zhengzhou, Henan, a man posted a video saying that his bicycle had been lost for 157 days and had not been found since he reported it to the police. The man said, "I really don't understand why Chinese people need foreigners to help them find their things."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, the Ministry of National Defense officially joined TikTok, and as of now, without publishing any works, the number of followers has exceeded 16 million. Interestingly, the account cannot be found by searching the name.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 19, a video of "New Zealand Prime Minister showing passers-by around his office" sparked discussion among netizens, with some netizens replying, "I don't even know the gender of the mayor, I don't even know who the township head is, and I can't even meet the neighborhood committee director."
